page.title: 06Growing potatoes
page.content: Phorate granules is a chemical mixed with seed potatoes before being planted.It kills of grubs and insects. The seed potatoes are put in soil with the potato planter.This digs a hole, drops the seed in and covers it over.The plants are fed with a fertilizer containing 12 units of nitrogen, 8 of phosphates,and 18 of potash. These are chemicals that all plants need for healthy growth.It comes in a bag that disolves in water.A tractor sprays the crop while it is young .When it is older they will need a helicopter to spray them.The harvester digs up the potatoes.Then the potatoes are put onto a long conveyor belt.They then go through a grader, into a washer and then a drier.The potatoes can not be packed when they are wet or they will rot.Then a machine weighs them.
